LanguageData.Attunement.degreeDatas.0.label: attunement
LanguageData.Attunement.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a special connection to latent psychic fields, occasionally hearing faint psychic whispers. {PAWN_pronoun} is more sensitive to psychic phenomenon and can meditate using Animus Crystals.
